tasks.task_description: Create content directory structure for all sections
Update types to include new content types
Create content library functions for all sections
Update navigation to include all sections
Create page templates for each section
Add sample markdown files for each content type
Test build process with all new pages

description: Expand website to accommodate full structure with markdown-driven content for all sections
context: Created comprehensive content directory structure and updated types and content library to support all new content types: consulting services, resources, case studies, testimonials, careers, and contact info

Created main page templates for all sections (consulting, resources, company, contact) and added sample markdown files for different content types. All pages follow the same pattern as blog/services with markdown-driven content.

Build completed successfully! All new pages are generating correctly: /consulting, /resources, /company, /contact. The website now has a complete structure with markdown-driven content for all sections.
